name: pear-rec
description: pear-rec is a cross platform screenshot, screen recording, audio recording, and video recording software.

scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently --names "WEB,DESKTOP" -c "red,blue" "pnpm run -C packages/web dev" "pnpm run -C packages/desktop dev"
scripts.build:desktop: pnpm run -C packages/desktop build && pnpm run project:desktop && pnpm run -C packages/desktop build:win
scripts.project:desktop: pnpm run -C packages/web build && node tools/copy-files-web2desktop.js
scripts.rebuild:server: pnpm run -C packages/server rebuild && pnpm run -C packages/desktop rebuild
scripts.dev:web: concurrently --names "SERVER,WEB" -c "red,auto" "pnpm run dev:server" "pnpm run -C packages/web dev"
scripts.build:web: concurrently -s "pnpm run -C packages/server dev" "pnpm run project:web"
scripts.project:web: pnpm run -C packages/web build && node tools/copy-files-web2server.js
